actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Federal Power Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Federal Power Commission for the fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Power Act, for authorizations of appropriations of a total of $83,740,000 for the Federal Power Commission for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 1976.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Power Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Federal Power Commission for the fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.
